user: CREATE TABLE user (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, fullname VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL, displayname varchar(50) NOT NULL, password VARCHAR(128) NOT NULL, salt VARCHAR(32) NOT NULL, email VARCHAR(320) UNIQUE NOT NULL, time_joined INTEGER NOT NULL);
vcard: CREATE TABLE cart (id INTEGER PRIMARY KEY NOT NULL, time_added INTEGER NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(user_id) REFERENCES user(id) NOT NULL, referenceID TEXT NOT NULL);
